markdownRemark.excerpt: Hi! I’m Chris Bautista. I’m a veteran programmer, addicted gamer, clueless photographer and novice writer.  This blog is mostly about programming, internet culture, a little about family, my work, and everything in between. This is my learning journal.
markdownRemark.html:
Hi! I’m Chris Bautista. I’m a veteran programmer, addicted gamer, clueless photographer and novice writer.

This blog is mostly about programming, internet culture, a little about family, my work, and everything in between. This is my learning journal. I do love challenges so if you have a topic I can help with post it as a comment or email me at challenges at codespud dot com.

What I do

  • Owner, CodeSpud Web Services.
  • Web developer
  • Video Gamer (Console mostly and some coin-ops)
  • Cook (Trying to be a Chef)
  • Voracious Eater
  • Clickpotato

frontmatter.title: Use Export Command To Help Linux Find Your Scripts
